title: Virgin Windows XP Pro VLK with SP3 WGA
description:
This is Original (virgin) Windows XP Pro VLK with Service Pack 3 slipstreamed.  No other changes have been made.  Service Packs 1 and
2 were never installed,  and are no longer needed.  It works as an in-place upgrade from Windows,  or as a self-boot CD for "repair" or new
installation.   In "repair" mode,  Media Player and Explorer are left as they previously exist.

After installing XP Pro SP3 VLK,  disable any virus protection temporarily then go into the WGA directory on the CD 
and do the following...

1. Open  Windows XP Keygen, to generate a genuine Serial key.   When the Program opens, under Product Famly, click the box and 
choose "WIndows XP Pro. VLK". then click the botton "Generate".  A Serial will appear on the bottom. Leave the program open!

2. Open the Program "keyFinder" which displays your Product key for any WIndows PC and Office Product. 
Make sure the "Microsoft Windows" tab is open. Then Click on the Options Menu, followed by "change Windows Key"
In the boxes enter the Serial key, from the Keygen Program and click "Change".  Exit and re-run the program to verify the key change.

If you want to upgrade from Media Player 9 to Media Player 10,  run the program MP10setup.exe

Reboot and go to Windows Update and install desired updates.   

The following steps are optional,  only if you have problems with Windows Update,  OR  you need to validate Office 2003:  If you are not
sure,  try step 4 first...

3. Open the program wga-fix.  Simply click Yes, don&#039;t worry about the unreadable language.

4. Open the program MGADiag (Microsoft Genuine Validtaion Diagnostic Tool.)
  Click "Continue"  
  Click RESOLVE while connected to the Internet if needed.
  Choose "Office" and make sure the code is 100.
